Na filosofia, os Akashic Records são con: In philosophy, the Akashic Records are considered a universal record of everything that has happened, is happening, and will happen. It is the "cosmic library" of existence.
Inspirados por essa ideia, o Akashic Rec: Inspired by this idea, Akashic Records, the app, seeks to be a portal to stories, a personal record of your readings. Here, you can immerse yourself in the world of novels, save your favorites, and build your own library of knowledge and entertainment.
Leitura Ilimitada: Explore um vasto catá: Unlimited Reading: Explore a vast catalog of novels, discovering new worlds and characters.
Sua Biblioteca Pessoal: Salve suas novel: Your Personal Library: Save your favorite novels, create your own library, and track your readings in an organized and efficient way.
Fontes Brasileiras: Curadoria cuidadosa: Brazilian Sources: Careful curation with a focus on novels in Portuguese, ensuring a rich and varied reading experience, with content you love.
Coleta Inteligente: Utilizamos a técnica: Intelligent Collection: We use the "scraping" technique to search for novels on various websites, bringing the best stories directly to you.
Luiz Eduardo, desenvolvedor Fullstack co: Luiz Eduardo, Fullstack developer with experience in Magento, PHP, Flutter, Dart, Vue, React, Native, TypeScript, JavaScript and Python.
Agradecemos a você por usar o Akashic Re: Thank you for using Akashic Records. Explore, discover new stories, and share your impressions! Your feedback is very important for us to continue improving.
